entities.name: mrs weasley
entities.description: Mrs. Weasley is mentioned as screaming in the text.

entities.name: bellatrix
entities.description: Bellatrix is described as laughing and having a gloating smile.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is mentioned as giving an exhilarated laugh before he toppled backward through the veil.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as knowing what was going to happen and feeling like he turned in slow motion.

entities.name: molly weasley
entities.description: Molly Weasley is mentioned as casting a curse that hit Bellatrix in the chest.

entities.name: kingsley
entities.description: Kingsley is mentioned as being blasted backward by Voldemort.

entities.name: slughorn
entities.description: Slughorn is mentioned as being blasted backward by Voldemort.

entities.name: mcgonagall
entities.description: McGonagall is mentioned as being blasted backward by Voldemort.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is described as screaming and directing his wand at Molly Weasley.

relationships.description: Molly's curse hit Bellatrix in the chest.
Voldemort blasted McGonagall backward through the air.
Voldemort blasted Kingsley backward through the air.
Voldemort blasted Slughorn backward through the air.
Voldemort directed his wand at Molly Weasley, who was being protected by Harry's Shield Charm.
